mapper.select: select a.*,c.customerName, d.driverName ,(@rownum:=@rownum + 1) xh from ( select t2.*,t1.sealNum boxId from cec_containertbl t1, cec_inboundtbl t2 where 1=1 and t1.inBoundIndex = t2.id and t1.sealNum = #{boxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) a inner join (SELECT @rownum := 0) r left join cec_customertbl c on a.customerID = c.id left join cec_drivertbl d on a.driverID = d.id where 1=1 and a.corpNo = #{corpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.inboundNo
